company_name.value: Ready Bytes Software Labs Pvt. Ltd.

terms_and_conditions.value:
1. Support isn't included for any of the paid apps. To get support you need to purchase additional support pack.
  2. Subscription can be cancelled at any time however no refunds will be issued.
  3. Subscription of any app cannot be shared. Sharing or other methods which allow for multiple, simultaneous downloads are strictly forbidden and may result in termination of your Subscription.
  4. You may not sublicense, assign, or transfer this license or your Subscription to anyone else without prior written consent from Ready Bytes™ Software Labs.
  5. All the apps are designed for latest Joomla and Respective components supported versions. No guarantee, that the apps will run with future versions of Joomla or Respective components.

184.title: Acknowledgement
184.description:
Ack-By-Email Action

Acknowledgement by Email action allows you to send acknowledgement to user via email on form submission. In general terms this action allows you to send an auto-reply-email whenever anyone submits a form.

  • You can set the email content as per your requirement.
  • It also enables you to use the user submitted data in the subject and content of the email.

Ack-By-SMS Action

Acknowledgement by SMS action allows you to send acknowledgement to user via mobile messages on form submission.

  • You can set the Message content as per your requirement.
  • For using this action you must have an account at SMS Gateway Hub.

Documentation : Acknowledgement by SMS
184.metadata: {"keywords":"acknowledgement, email, sms, notify, reply back, sms gateway hub","description":""}

185.title: Asana Task
185.description:
Asana Task Action

Asana allows teamwork without email. Asana puts conversations & tasks lists together, so you can get more done with less efforts.

Our Asana action allows you to push the submitted form data into your desired Asana account. It facilitates you to supply the form data to create a task in Asana with no extra efforts.

  • cURL installation on your server is mandatory to use this action

186.title: Chargify Customer
186.description:
Chargify Customers Action

Chargify is a recurring billing system for web2.0 and SaaS companies.

Our Chargify action allows you to collect data from forms on your website and place them in your Chargify account for easy invoicing.

Example: On successful registration of a new user you can automatically push the user’s registration form data into your Chargify account. It will save you from creating users manually, before sending them invoices.
186.metadata: {"keywords":"billing system, customer record, Chargify Customer for jxiforms","description":""}

187.title: Dropbox
187.description:
Dropbox Action

This action allows you to push any uploaded or attached data like images, video or any spreadsheets etc into your dropbox account directly.

The user will fill out an online form, attach the required file and press submit. The uploaded file will be available to you on your dropbox account to access on the go -- all credits go to our Dropbox Action.
187.metadata: {"keywords":"file management, upload file, dropbox for jxiforms","description":""}

188.title: Email
188.description:
Email Action

You have numerous forms on your website. Now managing them will become simple.

Email action can be used when you want to notify admins or any other user about a form submission along with the submitted data.

Now no need to check manually in the database, all the data in the inbox at your disposal.
188.metadata: {"keywords":"email, collect form data, email action for jxiforms","description":""}

189.title: Github (Issue & Milestone)
189.description:
GitHub Issue Action

GitHub is used worldwide to manage ticketing systems and report issues.

Now you can file issues dynamically on the go. Our GitHub Issue Action will allow you to create issues dynamically on some form submission.

Example: Suppose any user reports a bug in an online form on your website and you wish to create an issue automatically, for the same in your Github account. Then our action will aid you in performing the task easily.

Github Milestone Action

GitHub is used worldwide to manage ticketing systems and report issues.

Apart from the ticketing and issue reporting GitHub also allows you to create milestones to be achieved. Now, the process of milestone creation can be automated with our available action.

Github Milestone Action can create milestones dynamically on submission of forms.

Documentation : Github Milestone Action

Note: There is only one Plugin for Both GItHub-Issue and Milestone Actions and named Github. When you enable this then you will be able to create instances of both action.
189.metadata: {"keywords":"issue create, add milestone, revision control system,  Github (Issue & Milestone)","description":""}

190.title: Http-Query
190.description:
HTTP Query Action

This action picks up the submitted data from the online forms on your website and add them to any pre decided main URL. Then the combined URL is triggered by our action. The specific URL will perform the task predefined to it like deleting a subscription, creating Invoices or anything designated to it.

  • User will be unaware about - on what URL and what data is send on the http request.
  • To use this App your server must have cURL Installed.
190.metadata: {"keywords":"post data, post method, Http-Query for jxiforms","description":""}

191.title: Hubspot Contact
191.description:
Hubspot Contact Action

Hubspot is a tool used to coordinate the online marketing efforts for businesses. It also allows you to send regular emails to your clients.

Our action integrates JXi Forms to the Hubspot. It means now the user details submitted in your online forms can be automatically converted into a contact detail into your hubspot account.

No more manual addition of new users in your email list. It saves a lot of your time.
191.metadata: {"keywords":"marketing software, add contacts, hubspot for jxiforms","description":""}

192.title: Joomla Registration
192.description:
Joomla Registration Action

Automate and simplify the user registration process with this action.

This action can be used in integration with the default Joomla Registration Process. This action collects the form data, and automatically registers the user at your Joomla website. This action is also capable to reduce the complete registration process to a single field entry

193.title: Mailchimp
193.description:
MailChimp Action

MailChimp is an online email marketing solution to manage contacts, send emails and track results.

Our action subscribes the site visitors to your newsletters when they submit any form on your website. It is one of the very great marketing option for your business to grow worldwide.
193.metadata: {"keywords":"newsletter integration, subscribe newsletter,  mailchimp for jxiforms","description":""}

194.title: Reset Password
194.description:
Reset Password

Forgot your password or wanna change your password? No problem at all just implement this action to any of the existing forms at your end. It will allow you or any form user to reset their password.

Allows you the freedom to integrate the functionality with any form, anywhere on your website

195.title: SQL Query
195.description:
SQL Query Action

This feature is specifically for our geek fellows who work their way around, in the databases of websites.

SQL Query Action will allow you to execute automated SQL Queries on submission of a form. Just think about it and you will see the possibilities are vast :

  1. It will allow you to insert the form posted data into the database.
  2. It will even allow you to update your database externally.
  3. Or delete any data as per the requirements.
  4. and so on….
195.metadata: {"keywords":"insert in database, execute query, Sql action for jxiforms","description":""}

196.title: Email Pro
196.description:
Email Pro

This action allows you to automatically retrieve any attachment from the online forms directly in your inbox.

It means that any uploaded file on your online web forms will be automatically redirected to your defined mail box.

Now, no need to check the database manually.
